p: To ensure face validity, the first draft of the questionnaire was evaluated by six independent academics who have previous experience in Pharmacy Practice and Education. They informed the research team if any of the items in the questionnaire were not clear or difficult to comprehend. Comments and feedback provided were considered by the research team and then incorporated where appropriate to develop the final version of the questionnaire. Finally, the research team revised the items as necessary to make them concise and to fit for online administration.
